faqs.question: What is the return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address before your order is shipped by contacting our customer service.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries around the world. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by location.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can contact customer service via email at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: You can apply a discount code at checkout. Enter the code in the designated field and click 'Apply'.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
faqs.answer: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our customer service immediately with your order number and a photo of the damage.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of purchase. After that, we may not be able to cancel as the order may already be processed.

faqs.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional fee. You can select this option at checkout.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: You can create an account by clicking on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner of our website and filling out the registration form.

faqs.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
faqs.answer: If you forget your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.

faqs.question: How can I update my account information?
faqs.answer: You can update your account information by logging into your account and going to the 'Account Settings' page.

faqs.question: What is your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. You can read it on our website.

faqs.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer wholesale pricing for bulk orders. Please contact our sales team for more information.

faqs.question: What is your exchange policy?
faqs.answer: You can exchange an item within 30 days of purchase. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.

faqs.question: Can I request a specific delivery date?
faqs.answer: While we cannot guarantee specific delivery dates, you can add a note to your order, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

faqs.question: What if an item is out of stock?
faqs.answer: If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for a restock notification on the product page. We will notify you as soon as it is back in stock.

faqs.question: How can I leave a product review?
faqs.answer: You can leave a product review by logging into your account, going to the product page, and clicking on 'Write a Review'.
